summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North and West Seventieth Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Eighth Avenue Northwest; Greenwood Avenue, from North Sixty-fifth Street to North Eighty-fifth Street; North Eighty-third Street, from Greenwood Avenue to Woodland Park Avenue; and North Sixty-fifth, from Greenwood Avenue to Phinney Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, together with then necessary drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1116 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
